lore: At first, the Apis were gentle creatures that would never harm a living being. If they were in danger, their only coping strategy was escaping.\n\nAs the Apis Endurer gets hurt, its skin becomes more and more resilient until even the strength of a Giant fails to damage it. For this reason, many warriors raise these creatures from a young age so that they can ride them when they reach maturity.
menagerieDialog: (It yawns and turns away from you.)
(It seems unnecessarily agitated. Perhaps a few battles will drain its aggression.)
(You can't help but feel as though it knows exactly what you're thinking.)
(Upon your approach, it licks your hand over and over and over again. True love.)
(This creature is easily startled. You attempted to pat its head and it jumped as if it didn't know you were there.)
name: Apis Endurer
